general_advisory: Dry weather may favor pest infestation in crops, ensure proper protection.

advisory: To control Pyrilla and Mealy Bug infestation, spray Imidacl oprid 17.8% SL or Thiamethoxam 25% WG or Profenophos 50% EC.
Harvest maize grain when cob-sheath turns brownish and grains become hard.
Dry and store maize at proper moisture level to avoid damage.
To control Hawk moth or Dead head moth, manually remove caterpillars and spray Profenophos 50% EC.
Prepare chilli nursery with suitable varieties and seed quantities.
Deficit rainfall may cause Epilachna beetle infestation, manage with neem-based or chemical pesticide.
Prevent Damping off disease in nursery with appropriate treatment.
Dry weather may increase Mealy bug infestation in Papaya, manage with neem-based or chemical pesticide.
